chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I'm the navigator. Please describe what you see on the map and give me instructions on where to go.

First of all, if we start from the map, you are going to go to your right where the tiger is, which is the first island, you must go through the wood to be able to cross, we go through the wood again and we arrive where the parrot is that is right in front of the tree when arriving to the new island

Got it! So, starting from the map, I will go to the right where the tiger is on the first island. Then, I will go through the wood to cross it. After that, I will go through the wood again and arrive where the parrot is, right in front of the tree on the new island. Anything else I should know or any other instructions?
You must go around the forest where the parrot is and you will find an elephant while you are crossing the forest, then you will see some stones by the river where you must cross

Great! From the parrot on the new island, I will go around the forest. As I'm crossing the forest, I will come across an elephant. After that, I will continue until I see some stones by the river. Should I cross the river using those stones?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to navigate the map and follow the path I will guide you through?
yes
Great! Let's begin. You're currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. Take a few steps to the left (west), below a wooden bench. Can you describe what you see there?
I see a trunk

Excellent! Now, continue west until you cross a trail. After crossing the trail, make a left u-turn and head back towards the white dog. Once you reach the dog, there should be a wooden branch crossing a river nearby. Can you describe what you see?
the branch that is more in front of the dog?

Almost there! Actually, it's the branch just near the dog, not the one in front. It crosses the river. Go ahead and cross the branch, heading towards the south. Once you cross, continue going south. Do you see anything interesting on your way?
I already crossed the river and arrived in front of the white dog now?

Apologies for the confusion. Let's backtrack a bit. After crossing the branch, you should actually continue heading south. There's another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you see it?
I'm right with the white dog that is sitting next to the picnic

Oh, my mistake again. I apologize for the confusion. Now, from the white dog next to the picnic, go ahead and step over the picnic mat, then touch the bowl of berries. After that, continue heading west. Can you describe what you see along the way?
I see a river with 2 pieces of wood, one on each side to cross

That's correct! Cross the river using the wooden branch that goes north. Once you're on the other side, make sure to avoid touching a green bush. Instead, circle around it from the right. Keep going until you reach a florist stand. Can you see it?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I am the navigator for this map. How can I assist you today?
I will help you by giving you directions to cross
Thank you for offering to help! Could you please provide me with the first set of directions so that I can get started on the correct path?
agree. in front of you can you manage to see a dog?
Yes, I see a dog sitting in front of me. What should I do next?

You are going to go out, pass in front of the dog until you reach the dirt road, then you will see a bonfire where you will go through the middle of the dog and the bonfire to be able to go around the bonfire, when you are finishing going around the campfire you will see 2 red mushrooms, one bigger than the other, you will go through the middle of them until you reach a dirt road you will see a blue car on the road you will go to your right along the dirt road and you will go down until you reach a tree in front

Understood! I will move out and pass in front of the dog until I reach the dirt road. Then I will navigate through the middle of the dog and the bonfire to go around the bonfire. After that, I will continue on the dirt road, going to my right, until I see a tree in front. Is that correct?
yes

Great, thank you for confirming! 

I've followed your directions, and now I am at the tree in front. What should I do next to continue on the correct path?
When you are in front of the dawn on your right hand side you will be able to see a telescope.
Thank you for the instruction! I am now in front of the tree, and I can see the telescope on my right-hand side. What should I do next?
pass between the telescope and the tree to get to the path again

Got it! I will pass between the telescope and the tree to get back on the path. 

Alright, I've passed between the telescope and the tree. What's the next step to continue on the correct path?
take a few small steps and you will be able to see the house and thus arrive

Thank you for the guidance! I will take a few small steps and keep an eye out for the house.

I've taken the steps, and now I can see the house. I have successfully arrived at the final destination. *Finished*.

Thank you for your instructions! Is there anything else I can assist you with?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello, could you help me with the instructions?
Of course! I'm here to help. Are you ready to start the instructions?
yes

Great! Let's begin.

Step 1: Start by moving under the first palm tree to your southwest. Then, turn right and cross the second palm tree. Finally, make a sharp left turn before the third palm tree and continue southward. Can you describe what you see around you?
Should I pass in front of the dog or stick to the stone?
You should stick to the stone and pass to the left of the brown puppy. After that, slightly turn left and then turn right to continue south. Can you see the brown puppy and the stone?
yes
That's great! Keep moving southward. Now, let me know when you reach a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right. Describe what you see when you get there.
I see the beach and a crab

Good job! You've reached the right spot. Now, the path goes between the big rock on your left and the small rock on your right. Once you pass between them, you'll reach the water. Let me know when you've done that.
I'm already in the water in front of the crab
Perfect! Now, facing the large red crab, turn right (west) and follow the path along the big rock. Keep going west in the water. Let me know when you see a third, medium-sized rock.
I'm going where is the shark?
Ah, you're close! But before we reach the shark, we need to go along the big rock a little more. Keep following the path west in the water, and let me know when you see the third, medium-sized rock.
I'm already next to the 3rd rock
Great job! Now, be careful, as there's a shark nearby. Make a sharp turn to the right, away from the shark. Once you've made the turn, let me know what you see around you.
